      static OsvrClientKitLibrary.OSVR_ClientContext OsvrClientKitLibrary.osvrClientInit​(com.sun.jna.Pointer applicationIdentifier, int flags)
      Deprecated.
      use the safer method OsvrClientKitLibrary.osvrClientInit(byte[], int) instead
      Methods in com.jme.system.osvr.osvrclientkit with parameters of type OsvrClientKitLibrary.OSVR_ClientContext 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static byte OsvrClientKitLibrary.osvrClientCheckStatus​(OsvrClientKitLibrary.OSVR_ClientContext ctx)
      Checks to see if the client context is fully started up and connected properly to a server.
      If this reports that the client context is not OK, there may not be a server
      running, or you may just have to call osvrClientUpdate() a few times to
      permit startup to finish.
      static byte OsvrClientKitLibrary.osvrClientFreeInterface​(OsvrClientKitLibrary.OSVR_ClientContext ctx, OsvrClientKitLibrary.OSVR_ClientInterface iface)
      Free an interface object before context closure.
      static byte OsvrClientKitLibrary.osvrClientGetInterface​(OsvrClientKitLibrary.OSVR_ClientContext ctx, byte[] path, com.sun.jna.ptr.PointerByReference iface)
      Get the interface associated with the given path.
      static void OsvrClientKitLibrary.osvrClientLog​(OsvrClientKitLibrary.OSVR_ClientContext ctx, int severity, java.lang.String message)
      Log a message from the client.
      static byte OsvrClientKitLibrary.osvrClientShutdown​(OsvrClientKitLibrary.OSVR_ClientContext ctx)
      Shut down the library.
      static byte OsvrClientKitLibrary.osvrClientUpdate​(OsvrClientKitLibrary.OSVR_ClientContext ctx)
      Updates the state of the context - call regularly in your mainloop.

    • Uses of OsvrClientKitLibrary.OSVR_ClientContext in com.jme.system.osvr.osvrdisplay

      Methods in com.jme.system.osvr.osvrdisplay with parameters of type OsvrClientKitLibrary.OSVR_ClientContext 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static byte OsvrDisplayLibrary.osvrClientGetDisplay​(OsvrClientKitLibrary.OSVR_ClientContext ctx, com.sun.jna.ptr.PointerByReference disp)
      Allocates a display configuration object populated with data from the
      OSVR system.
      Before this call will succeed, your application will need to be correctly
      and fully connected to an OSVR server.
